title: Rincon Natural - La Plata Health Store - HappyCow
description: Health food store Rincon Natural in La Plata, Argentina has not been reviewed yet. Consider sharing your experience with Happycow's vegan & vegetarian community by writing the first review!
cleaned_text: - Health Store Specializing in macrobiotic and organic products; also ayurveda, anthroposophy, vegan, raw food, plus books, natural cosmetics, and personal care products. Open Mon-Sat 9:00am-1:00pm, Mon-Fri 4:30pm-8:30pm.
